name: d u e l
description:
My  first ever game! It was all to get some practice on creating and integrating sound for games. So sound up. I actually prefer it without the music, so you can hear all the effects, but wanted to try and integrate music/timing into it. All of the effects were recorded specifically for this in my studio using metal plates, ping pong balls, offcuts of wood with a combinatin of contact and condenser microphones, or synthesised with Max/MSP, Ableton. Integrated with Wwise.

Controls should be self-explanatory. Made for mouse but you can use the arrow keys too. Mouse scroll wheel changes sensitivity. Oh also, I added left shift as an alternative to firing beacuse on Macs control+left arrow does something weird, but I forgot to add it to the controls list.

I spent WAY too long on this. Feedback welcome; praise more so.
